mean_en: the act of calling down a curse that invokes evil (and usually serves as an insult)
word_etyma: male坏，恶+dict说+ion名词后缀→说坏话→诅咒
short_phrase: The angry woman calls a malediction down on him.
sentence: I call down a malediction on your head - from now on, may girls always ignore you!
sentence_trans: 我对着你的头许下诅咒：从现在开始，希望女孩们总是不理你。
